about_the_game:
Premise and Lore

SHARK RAIN is a story-driven, third person shooter that is set in a vast ocean covered with many different islands that used to be a modern day civilisation before it was catastrophically flooded many years ago.

Become a cute Shark Girl and use your Water Bazooka to flood the world. Transform into a shark to swim and jump through many different levels! Collect gems and special artifacts to upgrade your power!

The Hub World

Discover a newly found town full of cute and lively NPCs. Make friends, eat food, upgrade and customize your gear as you fight for a new hope against the specter of a past evil that is trying to claw its way back into power.

Real Time Water Simulation

SHARK RAIN utilizes the Fluid Flux real time 2D water simulation system which allows you to literally flood the entire game area with water! It will flow down slopes and cause objects to float and be pushed by the water's current!

Combat

Slap everyone with your tail and unlock different types of water spouting weapons to destroy your enemies!

Puzzles

Use the force of water to move objects and unlock secret areas!
